attributes.title: House Botley
attributes.allegiance: House Greyjoy'''House Botley''' is a vassal house from the Iron Islands that holds fealty to House Greyjoy. Their seat is located of the port town of Lordsport, on the island of Pyke.==History==Along with their Kings of House Hoare, House Botley participated in the conquest of the Riverlands.<ref>The Riverlands (Histories & Lore)</ref>==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, House Botley are loyal vassals of House Greyjoy. Its current lord is Sawane Botley.==See also==*AWOIAF (MAJOR spoilers from the books)Category:Vassal housesCategory:Noble housesCategory:Houses from the Iron IslandsCategory:House Botley
attributes.sigil: A shoal of silver fish on pale green

'''House Botley''' is a vassal house from the [[Iron Islands]] that holds fealty to [[House Greyjoy]]. Their seat is located of the port town of [[Lordsport]], on the island of [[Pyke]].

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Botley are loyal vassals of House Greyjoy. Its current lord is Sawane Botley.
sections.History: Along with their Kings of [[House Hoare]], House Botley participated in the conquest of the [[Riverlands]].<ref>[[The Riverlands (Histories & Lore)]]</ref>
